name: AuthProviderTokenResponse

fields.name: oauthSecretOrRefreshToken
fields.description: The OAuth secret or refresh token for the currently logged-in user.

constructors.name: AuthProviderTokenResponse
constructors.signature: public AuthProviderTokenResponse(String provider, String oauthToken, String oauthSecretOrRefreshToken, String state)
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the AuthProviderTokenResponse class using the specified authentication provider, OAuth access token, OAuth secret or refresh token, and state for a custom authentication provider plug-in.

params.name: state
params.description: The custom authentication provider. The OAuth access token. The OAuth secret or refresh token for the currently logged-in user. The state passed in to initiate the authentication request for the user.

description: Stores the response from the AuthProviderPlugin.handleCallback method.
